title: Acupuncture
author: Digital Empathy
description: Acupuncture for Dogs and Cats Accelerate healing. Decrease pain. Live better. Acupuncture can be used
cleaned_text: Acupuncture can be used to aid sedation, manage pain, supplement surgical procedures, or it can be a therapy on its own. By offering our pet patients acupuncture therapy, we aim to release toxins through an alternative, non-medicated method of healing and rehabilitation. Acupuncture can help with: - Cardiovascular (cardiomyopathy, etc) - Dermatological (allergic dermatitis, chronic skin disease, etc) - Gastrointestinal (inflammatory bowel disease, liver disease, etc) - Musculoskeletal (arthritis, hip dysplasia, etc) - Neurological (epilepsy, paralysis, etc) - Respiratory (asthma, chronic coughing, etc) - Urological (kidney disease, incontinence, etc) - Cardiovascular (cardiomyopathy, etc) - Dermatological (allergic dermatitis, chronic skin disease, etc) - Gastrointestinal (inflammatory bowel disease, liver disease, etc) - Musculoskeletal (arthritis, hip dysplasia, etc) - Neurological (epilepsy, paralysis, etc) - Respiratory (asthma, chronic coughing, etc) - Urological (kidney disease, incontinence, etc)
